sentences.sContent: They spoke good Spanish, and promised to interpret for me.
sentences.sCn: 他们西班牙语说得很好，答应替我翻译。

sentences.sContent: Freud’s attempts to interpret the meaning of dreams
sentences.sCn: 弗洛伊德对梦的含义的解析

sentences.sContent: ...How do the scientists interpret their observation from the experiment...
...The scientists interpret the girls’ excitement as meaning they are trying to understand what they have just seen...

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间) ＋ pret → 在两种语言中间说 → 口译

words.tran: 可说明的；可判断的；可翻译的

trans.tranOther: to translate spoken words from one language into another
